description:
Teresa Wagner, real name Teresa de Larsenburg, is the princess and heir to the throne of Larsenburg. She is an avid fan of the fictional TV series Rainbow Shogun. She`s a transfer student and she lives in the Grand Palace Ginza nearby Tada`s Coffee shop with her bodyguard Alex. An energetic, airheaded girl, Teresa hides her identity when living in Japan. She owns a Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF7.
Teresa is not arrogant and has realistic expectations. She is aware of her responsibilities to Larsenburg, which include marrying her fianc√© Charles and becoming the Queen, but she admits she has fallen in love with Tada.
name: Teresa Wagner
